name: Calorie Calculator
description: Calculate daily caloric needs and track food intake for weight management.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-scale size-5"><path d="m16 16 3-8 3 8c-.87.65-1.92 1-3 1s-2.13-.35-3-1Z"></path><path d="m2 16 3-8 3 8c-.87.65-1.92 1-3 1s-2.13-.35-3-1Z"></path><path d="M7 21h10"></path><path d="M12 3v18"></path><path d="M3 7h2c2 0 5-1 7-2 2 1 5 2 7 2h2"></path></svg>

name: Recipe Scaling Calculator
description: Easily adjust recipe ingredients for different serving sizes.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-utensils size-5"><path d="M3 2v7c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h4a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V2"></path><path d="M7 2v20"></path><path d="M21 15V2a5 5 0 0 0-5 5v6c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h3Zm0 0v7"></path></svg>

name: Portion Size Calculator
description: Calculate proper portion sizes for different foods and serving needs.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-cookie size-5"><path d="M12 2a10 10 0 1 0 10 10 4 4 0 0 1-5-5 4 4 0 0 1-5-5"></path><path d="M8.5 8.5v.01"></path><path d="M16 15.5v.01"></path><path d="M12 12v.01"></path><path d="M11 17v.01"></path><path d="M7 14v.01"></path></svg>

name: Recipe Cost Calculator
description: Calculate the total cost of recipes including ingredients and portions.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-dollar-sign size-5"><line x1="12" x2="12" y1="2" y2="22"></line><path d="M17 5H9.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 0 0 7h5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 0 7H6"></path></svg>

name: Meal Prep Calculator
description: Plan your weekly meal prep with portions, ingredients, and shopping lists.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-calendar size-5"><path d="M8 2v4"></path><path d="M16 2v4"></path><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="4" rx="2"></rect><path d="M3 10h18"></path></svg>

name: Nutrition Calculator
description: Calculate nutritional values including calories, protein, carbs, and fats.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-heart size-5"><path d="M19 14c1.49-1.46 3-3.21 3-5.5A5.5 5.5 0 0 0 16.5 3c-1.76 0-3 .5-4.5 2-1.5-1.5-2.74-2-4.5-2A5.5 5.5 0 0 0 2 8.5c0 2.3 1.5 4.05 3 5.5l7 7Z"></path></svg>

name: Crop Yield Profit Calcuator
description: Calculate the yield and profit of a crop based on its size and yield.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-apple size-5"><path d="M12 20.94c1.5 0 2.75 1.06 4 1.06 3 0 6-8 6-12.22A4.91 4.91 0 0 0 17 5c-2.22 0-4 1.44-5 2-1-.56-2.78-2-5-2a4.9 4.9 0 0 0-5 4.78C2 14 5 22 8 22c1.25 0 2.5-1.06 4-1.06Z"></path><path d="M10 2c1 .5 2 2 2 5"></path></svg>

name: Compost Decomposition time Calculator
description: Calculate the time it takes for compost to decompose based on its size.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-clock size-5"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle><polyline points="12 6 12 12 16 14"></polyline></svg>
